title: Treeline ruined with sloppy afterthought towers!
body:
So it's obvious there are people working at Riot that have nothing to do because they are adding unneccesary, overcrowding, afterthought towers to a map that didn't need them. Can you guys just mop up the office or something instead of ruining maps with snowballs and towers?

Signed,
Someone who liked TT and now thinks it sucks.

replies.body:
Some of us liked first TT map. It got changed.
Now it's second change.. 
Bad or good I really dunno.. All that matters is they haven't forgotten about TT...yet
p.s, I'm sorry I'm being a bag about it but I really really do not like the changes. Really. Please put it back and if you want to work on a map, please do it on a new one.
